value: As a reaction, you may gain advantage on a save against becoming paralysed.
As a reaction, you may gain advantage on a save against becoming unconscious (does not work when going down).
As a reaction, you may gain advantage on a save against becoming blinded.
As a reaction, you may gain advantage on a save against becoming charmed.

As a reaction, you may gain advantage on a save against being knocked prone.
As a reaction, you may gain advantage on a save against becoming restrained.
As a reaction, you may gain advantage on a save against becoming stunned.
As a reaction, you may gain advantage on a save against becoming incapacitated (does not include conditions where incapacitated is a side-effect).

You may spend an action to cause targets of your next effect that can cause the 'paralysed' condition to make that save with disadvantage. This does not work if a minute has passed since you sacrificed your action. Alternatively, you  may gain advantage and sacrifice your next action.
